alert.note: Alert for Owen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 12:37PM EST until January 04 at 7:09PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Northern Kentucky, including the following counties, Grant, Owen and Pendleton. * WHEN...Until 230 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1237 PM EST, local law enforcement reported lingering flooding and high water over some area roadways. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Williamstown, Morgan, Corinth, Keefer, Cordova, Camp Northward, Cherry Grove, Lawrenceville, New Columbus, Natlee, Marcus, Elk Lake, Beechwood, Harmony, Mckinneysburg and Browning Corner.
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
